Name: PushOps
About the game: PUSHOPS PushOps is a roguelike with a twist: There are no weapons! As a player, you must manipulate physics objects to survive. Fast moving blocks will deal damage. FEATURES: 3 level types, alongside a final boss Endless mode 21 unique custom items 6 playable characters (can buy in the shop) Many different enemy types Colourblind modes 6 different block types, with unique properties Destructable environment Speedrun timers This game is heavily inspired by Downwell and Nuclear Throne. All Music by HeatlyBros. Check out his YouTube channel!
